Content:: Ariyanayagam Kaveenthiran Kodeeswaran (Tamil: அரியநாயகம் கவீந்திரன் கோடீசுவரன்; also known as Kodeeswaran Robin Tamil: ரொபின் கோடீசுவரன்) is a Sri Lankan Tamil politician and Member of Parliament.[1] Kodeeswaran is a member of the Tamil Eelam Liberation Organization.[2] He was one of the Tamil National Alliance's (TNA) candidates in Ampara District at the 2015 parliamentary election. He was elected and entered Parliament.[3][4][5]  This article about a politician from Eastern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: K. Kodeeswaran - Wikipedia
